com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.endpoint
Class InterestGroupServiceEndpoint

java.lang.Object
  com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.endpoint.InterestGroupServiceEndpoint
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.util.ServiceNamespaces
@Endpoint
public class InterestGroupServiceEndpoint
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.util.ServiceNamespaces

The Interest Group Service allows clients to manage UICDS Interest Group. It includes services to:

  • create an interest group
  • create an incident from a CAP version 1.1 alert document
  • get the interest group restricted document
  • update information about an interest group
  • share the interest group with other UICDS cores
  • close an interest group
  • archive an interest group

An interest group is defined as the following data structure:

Since:
1.0
Author:
Daphne Hurrell
See Also:
Appendix: InterestGroupService.wsdl, Appendix: InterestGroup.xsd, Appendix: InterestGroup.xsd, Appendix: InterestGroupService.xsd

                                                                                         throws javax.xml.datatype.DatatypeConfigurationException
Archives an interest group by removing it and all of the associated work products. The interest group must be closed before it is archived.
